EmailTemplate.name: 10_13_2015 VIP Dinner Reminder.Dinner Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: It's Time To Party!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, Get ready the VMTurbo VIP Dinner Reception is tonight! Remember to bring your VMworld badge as all who attend will automatically be entered into our VMworld drawing for the chance to win a Samsung Gear VR headset and accompanying Galaxy S6 phone! Tuesday, October 13th 2015 21:30 - 00:00 AM The Silvestre <http://restaurante-silvestre.com/en/> Carrer de Santalo, 101 08021 Barcelona
- The VMTurbo Team
